summary: An ordinance appropriating money from the City Railway Fund to W. S. Robertson, in payment of claim for personal injuries to wife, Helen Robertson, File No. 156699, and directing the City Comptroller to cancel warrant in the sum of $100.00 on the City Railway Fund, drawn in favor of W. S. Robertson, under authority of Ordinance No. 67773, and repealing that portion of Ordinance No. 67773 appropriating such sum from the City Railway Fund.
